item.title: A New Direction
item.description: So it has been quite a while since I posted anything here. Not that I have ever been at a fast and furious pace of content creation, but almost a year since my last post is a bit much. Looking at the date of my last post I can begin to understand why. This blog is going to take a bit of a more personal turn. Mainly because that is what I have been working on… me.
